name: Penguknight
description:
Fight monsters as a Penguin Knight and reach the end of the dungeon!

Very short game made by beginner game developers for Metroidvania Game Jam Month 19.

Controls:

Arrows to move.

F to attack.

M to muse music.

E to pick up objects.

Left Shift to dash (when you unlock it ;) ).

Made by:

Oscar Aguinagalde

Gonzalo Piérola

Iker Ortega

Sujin Park
